name: Avoid the Spikes - Demo Version
description:
Instructions:

Use 'A' & 'D' to move left and right.

Avoid spikes for as long as you can to set a highscore.

Note:

Since it's still in demo, the game might break and have bugs.

If you want to play the original game its link is - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/703545081/
